colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES MNOL BSANGS 'DI NI RANG BZHIN @006A *, ,GSHIS LUGS BZANG GA-YO SGYU MING CING TA BLA MA DKON MCHOG GSUM LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD GUS LDAN ZHING 'GRO BA DMAN PA LA BYAMS BRTZE'I RGYAN DANG LDAN PA TSA KAN TAR ZHES BYA BA GSUNG GIS BSKUL BA NGO MCHOG GI CHED DU, ,SKYABS GNAS DAM PAR GYUR BA BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAM GA-YENG GIS 'KHYER BA'I BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,)
